sections.installation:
Note: WP Legal Cases is now built on the Piklist framework. Piklist should be installed from the plugins director before installing WP Legal Cases.

METHOD 1 (Preferred)

Install Piklist
1. Log in to your WordPress site. 1. Go to Plugins -> Add New. 1. In the search box, type “Piklist”. 1. Click “Install”. 1. Once the installation is complete, click “Activate Plugin”.

Install WP Legal Cases
1. Return to Plugins -> Add New. 1. In the search box type “WP Legal Cases”. 1. Cick “Install”. 1. Once the installation is complete, click “Activate Plugin”.

Method 2

Install Piklist
1. Download Piklist from the plugin directory. 1. Login to WordPress and go to Plugins-> Add New -> Upload Plugin. 1. Click the “Choose File” button and select piklist.zip from your hard drive. 1. Click “Install Now”. 1. Once the plugin has been installed, click “Activate”.

Install WP Legal Cases
1. Download WP Legal Cases from the plugin directory. 1. Login to WordPress and go to Plugins->Add New->Upload Plugin. 1. Click the “Choose File” button and select wp-legal-cases.zip from your hard drive. 1. Click “Install Now”. 1. Once the plugin has been installed, click “Activate”.
sections.faq:
What is Piklist?

Piklist is a rapid development framework that helps developers quickly build better WordPress plugins and themes (can you tell that I’m a fan?). Once the Piklist plugin is installed on your site, you can ignore it completely.
